document_data.name: Garauder
document_data.mainbody: '''Garauder''' was a [[pit fiend]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] slain by [[the Simbul]].
document_data.Personality: He had hatreds and schemes in place at the time of his death.
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|1372}}, Garauder was one of the pit fiends sent to strike at the [[Simbul]] when she assaulted [[Avernus]] in search of [[Elminster Aumar]]. He was the last survivor after the creatures summoned by the Simbul's ''[[blood ring]]'' spell struck out to defend her; however, when he attempted to make a suicide attack on her, he was eaten by a [[dragon]] summoned by the ''blood ring'' that he had missed before.
